579:1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo'bhūt|
579:2: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā|
579:10: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat-na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti|
579:11: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti|
579:13: na te kauśika sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
579:15: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti|
579:18: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu te sattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ?
579:21: bhagavānāha-ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
579:23: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati|
579:24: asya kauśika puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakāṇāṃ jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ śīlamayaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti|
579:25: sahasratamīmapi śatasahasratamīmapi koṭītamīmapi koṭīśatatamīmapi koṭīsahasratamīmapi koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti|
579:26: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi aupamyamapi upanisāmapi upaniṣadamapi na kṣamate,
579:27: yena kuśalamūlena sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhavati,
579:29: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati||
579:30: atha khalvanyataro bhikṣuḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-abhibhūto'si kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati|
579:31: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati|
579:32: evamukte śakro devānāmindrastaṃ bhikṣumetadavocat-ekacittotpādenaiva ahamārya tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā abhibhūtaḥ|
579:33: kaḥ punarvādo ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati|
579:34: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati|
579:35: kaḥ punarvādo ye śrutvā udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
579:38: te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ|
579:39: na kevalaṃ te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
579:41: tānapi te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ|
579:42: na kevalaṃ srotaāpannān sakṛdāgāmino'nāgāmino'rhataḥ pratyekabuddhānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
579:43: ye'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahādānapatayaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
579:44: tānapi te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ|
579:45: na kevalaṃ tān mahādānapatīn bodhisattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
579:46: ye'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā pariśuddhaśīlā akhaṇḍena śīlaskandhenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
579:47: tānapi te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ|
579:48: na kevalamakhaṇḍenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
579:49: ye'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣāntisaṃpannā upaśamasaṃpannā apratihatacittā antato dagdhasthūṇāyāmapyāghātacittaṃ notpādayanti prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
579:50: tānapi te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ|
579:52: ye'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ārabdhavīryā anikṣiptadhurā akusīdā anavalīnakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
579:53: tānapi te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ|
579:55: ye'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānārāmā dhyānaratā dhyānabalino dhyānabalavanto dhyānapratiṣṭhitā dhyānavaśinaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
579:56: tānapi te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ|
579:57: yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṃ sarvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānanupāyakuśalāṃśca bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavati,
579:60: yo hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
579:62: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthito bhavati|
579:64: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ pratipadyamāno nacirādgamiṣyati bodhimaṇḍam|
579:65: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sattvān kleśapaṅke saṃsīdamānānuddhariṣyati|
579:66: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate,
579:69: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyanti-kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣasva,
579:71: imāni te catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena pratigrahītavyānīti|
579:72: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kevalaṃ catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
579:75: tathāgatairapi so'rhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairnityameva samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ|
579:76: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāni kānicillaukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramikāṇi vā anyāni vā utpadyeran,
579:77: tānyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ notpatsyante|
579:78: ayamapi bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhavati||
579:79: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānantasyaitadabhavat-kimayaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ svakena pratibhānena bhāṣate,
579:81: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat-buddhānubhāvo'yamāryānanda veditavyaḥ,
